children.text: time of year again where we come together to celebrate the best and most notable game releases for the year. Our team has worked together to vote and come up with their favourite games of the year over 11 categories. We wanted the Switchaboo 2021 game of the year to be an event, therefore we'll be announcing the winners throughout the week. And here we go:
NEO: The World Ends With You
And the winner is... NEO: The World Ends With You!
And the winner is... Henchman Story!
NEO: The World Ends With You
And the winner is... NEO: The World Ends With You!
Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin
NEO: The World Ends With You
And the winner is... Metroid Dread!
Most Anticipated Future First/Third Party Release
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Sequel
And the winner is... The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Sequel!
And the winner is... Hollow Knight: Silksong!
And the winner is... Mario Party Superstars!
NEO: The World Ends With You
And the winner is... Monster Hunter Rise!
And the winner is... Death's Door!
NEO: The World Ends With You
And the winner is... NEO: The World Ends With You!
